trackerSubtitle: Add your passport/ID process number; we'll check status and notify you by email if it changes.
loginPrompt: Please sign in to add a process number. Your entry will be stored locally for 15 minutes.
noDocs: No documents yet. Add a number above to start.
signInSubtitle: Enter your email to get a secure login link.
emailSentDesc: Check your inbox for the magic link.

errorMessages.INVALID_INPUT: Invalid input. Please check your details.
errorMessages.RATE_LIMITED: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.
errorMessages.DATABASE_ERROR: Server error. Please try again later.
errorMessages.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.

cachedNotice: Your entry is stored locally for 15 minutes.
footerNote: Service provided as-is; details in the terms.
disclaimerTitle: Independent from the City of Munich authorities
disclaimerBody: Dokustatus is neither commissioned nor affiliated. Status data is read from publicly available services of the City of Munich and provided without guarantee.
disclaimerLinkNote: offers the same status query directly.
emailNotEncrypted: Emails are sent unencrypted via standard email!
rateLimitBody: You have reached a fetch limit. Please wait and try again. If needed, you can also check directly via https://www.muenchen.de/pass.
trackRateLimitBody: Too many updates for this document. Please wait and try again.
trackingAdded: Tracking added and confirmed. We'll email you when the status changes.
confirmDeleteBody: This will remove your account and all tracked documents. This action cannot be undone.

tracking.leadStart: We are watching number {number} for you and will notify you of changes.
tracking.reasonStart: you started tracking a document on {app}
tracking.footerStart: You can remove tracking anytime in the app.
tracking.leadUpdate: There is a new update for document {number}.
tracking.reasonUpdate: you are tracking this document on {app}
tracking.footerUpdate: If you didn't expect this, remove the document or ignore this email.

accountDeletion.subject: Your Dokustatus account has been deleted
accountDeletion.headline: Account deleted
accountDeletion.lead: Your Dokustatus account and all document tracking data have been removed.
accountDeletion.body: Your account, login links, and tracked documents are now erased from Dokustatus.
accountDeletion.footer: If you didn't request this, contact support immediately.

IN_BEARBEITUNG.title: Your ID document is still being processed
IN_BEARBEITUNG.message:
Processing times:
• Express passport: 3–6 business days
• Passport/ID card: 4–5 weeks
• eID card: 5–6 weeks

AUSGEHAENDIGT.title: Your ID document has already been handed over

IN_DIREKTVERSAND.title: Your ID document has been dispatched
IN_DIREKTVERSAND.message: Shipped by Bundesdruckerei GmbH and on its way.

DIREKTVERSAND_ZUGESTELLT.title: Your ID document has been delivered

DIREKTVERSAND_FEHLGESCHLAGEN.title: Unfortunately your ID document could not be delivered
DIREKTVERSAND_FEHLGESCHLAGEN.message: Held for 7 days at Deutsche Post, then returned to Bürgerbüro Ruppertstr. 19.

UNBEKANNT.title: The status of your ID document is unknown

DOKUMENT_UNBEKANNT.title: The entered ID number is unknown
